TneTabControl.DeleteTab(string,Boolean) Method

Summary

Deletes the tab with the specific tag

Namespace: neTabControl
Syntax
Delphi
public
 procedure DeleteTab(const Tag: string; const forceDelete: Boolean=False);

Parameters

Tag
Type: string

The tag of the tab to be deleted

forceDelete
Type: Boolean

If true, the tab is deleted even if the CanClose property is false

Reference

  • TneTabControl
  • neTabControl
